amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $10 million and increase the Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation Defense-Wide account by a similar amount to fund grants for ongoing work at the Defense Threat Reduction Agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $10 million and increase the Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation Defense-Wide account by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Higgins amendment (A012) Failed by voice vote.
